channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-25196|2024-08-03T04:36:05.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitlab%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitLab Authentication Plugin 1.13 and earlier records the HTTP Referer header as part of the URL query parameters when the authentication process starts, allowing attackers with access to Jenkins to craft a URL that will redirect users to an attacker-specified URL after logging in.
